name: Outland (itch)
description:
You are in your village then your village is attacked by monsters and it gets destroyed you must travel across the large open world to attack monsters befriend monsters gain followers to assist you in battle you can get 3 different endings based on your choices

Expected release date is mid to late 2023

A steam version will come out the same time so when you buy it you get a steam key

A free demo will be released around early 2023

** further description coming soon**
